title: Rito can we get a dancing poro while the game is loading, so we know if we crashed or not?
body: That way we don't have to play the game where, is that person just really slow at loading or is my game broken.

replies.body:
I've had this happen to me so many times and there have been many times where my game just froze and didn't realize it. Also there have been times where my friends clients would freeze and they wouldn't realize it, but the game wouldn't start until they restarted the client.

If it keeps bouncing between 140 and 160, you know it hasn't crashed.

Works pretty well for me.

That doesn't work for everyone, some peoples ping sometimes stay the same during the whole loading process. Most always mine stays at 52 and I contemplate whether my game froze (cause my laptop is really old) and I don't want to accidentally close the client when nothing is wrong. Also those games where everyone is loaded and nothing happens
But sometimes your ping can become very stable for a while. So you might be crashed but you just don't know.

While I approve 100% of the idea of a dancing Poro, there's another way.

Unless you have a magical, super stable internet connection, your ping will fluctuate, that way you can know the loading is still going.
Better yet, why cant we have 'themes'? Imagine the entire shop, background screen, Home Menu, etc were all based off a subject. Such as Poros, the Firejlord, Shurima, etc. I'd love a Firejlord one!

I think there should be a loading icon. maybe have a bunch of different ones you can buy in the store for 250 rp 2500ip something like that. Like have a character on the bottom right of the screen doing some silly animation the poro should be the default loading loading icon XD
I can tell if my ping changes every few seconds

I approve of this message.

Not that I don't want this, but for the time being, you can try this.

Just watch your ping on the loading screen. If its not changing every 5 seconds or so, you've probably frozen up. If its changing, be patient, you're just still loading. 

Hasn't failed me yet.

I have starting clicking the middle of my screen every 15 seconds or so while the game loads up to see if my game has crashed. 
I usually get on an app on my phone till the game starts, and sometime wont notice 15 minutes went by with my game still "loading", only to find out i probably just cost my team the game because i noticed too late i had my game crash on my. I think the dancing poro, or maybe just anything moving during the loading screen is a brilliant idea!
This needs to happen! Just lost a ranked match because they were at our inhib by the time I noticed my client was frozen and not waiting for our Morgana to load... :/

This. We need this.
***I want this.***

riot please make this a thing

(But I will have to admit, [this post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/o9jZWtnx-rito-can-we-get-a-dancing-poro-while-the-game-is-loading-so-we-know-if-we-crashed-or-not?comment=001c) was pretty fkin awesome.)

Upvote, though I will say an SSD sure helps. Not saying that's the solution, anything animated on the loading screen would be absolutely superb (those percentages are obviously nonsense, they freeze at 100 too often and you just don't know whether to alt+f4 or not), but it's a heck of a luxury to be able to load the game in a few seconds. Can't wait until those things become just a little more mainstream (as in, almost completely replace platter-based SSDs as default options on prebuilt comps, at which point I'd consider them mainstream)
bro i think you want a dancing poro at the loading screen just to have it....rito plz make it a thing D:
